name: Guardians of Lodino Forest
description:
"Guardians Of Lodino Forest" (G.O.L.F. for short) is an amazing need to play experience, it's a hybrid sports adventure rhythm game about shooting an Armored series golf ball bosses (Guardians) into submission and then striking them back deep into their lair, for a hole in one.

For this task, you are equipped with your fusion Rocket Trainers and the Lodino Rifle: a hybrid Golf club / Assault rifle.

You are a Guardian Hunter, poised with the task of ridding the Universe from these harbingers of Death.

SEARCH & DESTROY each and every Guardian in you path, take cover as they ATTACK you with their disintegration rays of defense, FULLFIL YOUR DESTINY

SEEK VENGENCE FOR WHAT THEY HAVE DONE!!!



This interactive experience is one part, SPACE HARRIER, one part, Attack on Titan, one part, NES Golf Grand Slam with Hours of Arcade fun!!!



Your Lodino Assault Rifle has now been fully UPGRADED to "VOX STRIKER" mode!!! (For Your Safety)

G.O.L.F FEATURES:

-18 holes
-18 Insane Armored Otherworldly Giant Alien spherical Guardians
-Killer Vaporwave soundtrack
-4 hand-crafted environments
-6 dynamic bullet hell patterns
-Dynamic evolving difficulty
-Lo-fi / Art House presentation
-Final Score Tally at the end of each 18 Planet Hunt run

Controls


***Mouse & Keyboard control ONLY***

WASD/arrow keys: move (move forward for improved speeds)

Left Mouse Button (LMB) / space bar: fire Lodino Rifle

(While Guardian is Downed "RED") Left Mouse Button (LMB) / space bar: Slash Attack

Mouse Cursor - Movement for better Targeting reticle accuracy over swing bar

F4: toggle Fullscreen

M button: Mute in-Game Music

(While in active play) Esc: Restart Match Run /

Esc on Title Menu: Quit GameLooking forward to seeing everyone's HIGH SCORES!!!
Created by Adrien Dittrick for the VoxPop Games Platform
